data.text: @TeacherInKinder Then YOU should totally read the article, that's who it's written for. I'm not exposed, so that's why I haven't had it. The moment I'm exposed, I'm sure I'll get it.

@misshteaches4 Nose correctly. I still have no idea how I haven't had it. I have had everything else under the sun including several boughts of strep throat when I thought for sure I had it. I guess we will never know why I didn't get it.

@misshteaches4 I haven't gotten covid and it's been in my house twice (different people) and I teach kindergarten so masks are basically a Petrie dish for germs (you should see how filthy some are) as they chew on them, suck on them, throw them around, and of course, never have it over their 1

@misshteaches4 We are lifting the mask mandate in Ontario. I’m still not convinced it’s appropriate for now. We will still “mask up” when in enclosed spaces. Our public school students are on March Break next week so we shall see….
@misshteaches4 Hmm let’s see… both adults in my home are vaccinated and boosted, we wear masks, we have a strict no vaxx-no visit policy, we use common sense…
